net.sf.jasperreports.engine.design

Class JRValidationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JRException
          • net.sf.jasperreports.engine.design.JRValidationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class JRValidationException
extends JRException
    An exception that contains a list of report validation faults.
    Version:
    $Id: JRValidationException.java 5878 2013-01-07 20:23:13Z teodord $
    Author:
    Lucian Chirita (lucianc@users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    JRVerifier, Serialized Form
